results.name: Column 1 of triangle A104030, which is the matrix inverse of the triangle of pairwise sums of trinomial coefficients.
comment: Column 0 of triangle A104030 forms signed Hammersley's polynomial p_n(1) (A006846), offset 1.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Feb 26 2005
